Great upload and absolutely fantastic movie!

Terry Gilliam is such a great filmmaker. Too bad the studio ruined his Grimm movie. This movie was a brilliant piece of satire and I would highly recommend it to anyone with something other than air between the ears. It's also visually stunning, brilliantly acted and directed and very funny. 

Colin Farrell does an incredible role portraying another famous actor and for once I was not annoyed by the presence of Tom Waits.

Truley amazing movie which I will now purchase when released on blu-ray. Thanks again.
